entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:22 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -21.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 12:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -21.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 49 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -29.6°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
